text: Alain Lefebvre (born 1 April 1947) is a French journalist. Graduate from the École nationale de l'aviation civile (French civil aviation university), Conférences, colloques, lectures he founded the ephemeral Magazine hebdo while managing the groupe Media and L'Histoire magazine. Lefebvre is also interested in advertising in collaboration with journalist Christian Blachas, also host of the show Culture-Pub. reflexes.samizdat.net == Works == * Alain Lefebvre, Dominique Méda, Faut-il brûler le modèle français ?, Éditions du Seuil, 2006, 156 p.
